pre_caption: In a static, straight-on shot, a bright cyan light source is positioned in the background at the top center of the frame. From this area, numerous thin, vertical streaks of blue light extend downwards through the middle ground, covering the width of the scene. Scattered throughout the entire space, from the background to the foreground, are countless small, sparkling blue particles. These particles, along with the streaks, continuously drift downwards from the top of the frame towards the bottom, creating a sense of depth and constant motion.
